We offer a wide range of courses including Computer Science, Business Management, and Engineering. Admission requirements vary depending on the course. The tuition fee also varies by course. Please check our website for more information.
We have various scholarships available for students. The admission deadline is on August 31.

patterns: what are the student requirements for admission?
responses:
Academic Level
NEB +2 overall aggregate of 2.2 CGPA (55%) or above with each subject (theory and practical) grade D+ or above, and SEE Mathematics score of C+ ( 50%) or above.
For A-Levels, a minimum of 3.5 credits and atleast a grade of D and above.

English Proficiency
English NEB XII Marks greater or equals to 60% or 2.4 GPA
For Level 4 or Year 1 BIT
Pass in General Paper or English Language or IELTS 5.5 or PTE 47/ Meeting UCAS Tariff points of 80.
For Level 4 or Year 1 BBA
Pass in General Paper or English Language or IELTS 5.5 or PTE 47/ Meeting UCAS Tariff points of 96.

patterns: how many classes will be there in a day
responses: There may be two or three classes per day. Each class will be of 1 hour and 30 minutes.

patterns: what is the teaching style of this college?
Is the teaching pattern different from other college?
responses:
Our college has different teaching patterns than other colleges of Nepal. We adopt a British teaching methodology, following the LTW techniques which stands for Lecture, Tutorial and Workshop.
You can provide us with your contact details and our counselors shall reach out to you and provide you with further details.
There are assignments which carry more weight than your written exams. The assignments have deadlines which you should not exceed if you want to get better marks.

patterns: How can I apply for admission?
What documents do I need to submit?
responses: You can apply for admission through our website. The admission process involves submitting your academic records and other supporting documents. There is no entrance exam for most courses.

patterns: Do you have any visiting professors?
responses: Our faculty members are highly qualified and experienced professionals. The faculty-student ratio is 1:20. We occasionally invite visiting professors to teach special courses.
Library works from : 09 : 00 am  to  06 : 00 pm
chaitanya Bharathi institute of technology is located in Gandipet, Hyderabad near ocean park

patterns: Do you have a sports program?
What sports facilities do you have?
Do you offer scholarships for athletes?
responses: Yes, we have a sports program that offers various sports activities and competitions. We have a gymnasium, a basketball court, a soccer field, and a swimming pool. We also offer scholarships for athletes who excel in their respective sports.

patterns: Do you have a canteen in CBIT?
What food options do you have?
responses: Yes, we have a cafeteria that serves a variety of food options including vegetarian and non-vegetarian dishes. We also offer a meal plan for students.

patterns: will there be any extra curriculum activities?
does the college conducts any fun program
responses:
Yes, Of course. Our college not only provides excellent education but also encourage students to take part in different curriculum activities. The college conducts yearly programs like Sports meet, Carnival, Holi festival, and Christmas. 
 Also our college has basketball court, badminton court, table tennis, chess, carrom board and many more refreshment zones.

patterns: what facilities are provided by the college?
what are the facilities of college for students
responses: With excellent education facilities, Our College provides various other facilities like 24 hours internet, library, classes with AC, discusson room, canteen, parking space, and student service for any students queries.
